snippet.title: Sally - Wholesome Direct 2024 Trailer
snippet.description:
This trailer premiered during the 2024 edition of the Wholesome Direct, and announces the first-ever Sally Demo! The demo is now available on Steam, and is playable until the end of the Steam Next Fest, on June 17th, 2024.

Please be aware that the Sally demo is an in-production product and does not reflect the final game. Think of it as a teaser you can play.

Wishlist and play on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2165040/Sally/
